mapper.select: select group_concat(name) from t_user_2 where name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
select to_base64(#{toBase64}) as mysqlBase64,from_base64(#{fromBase64}) as mysqlStr from dual
select unix_timestamp(str_to_date(#{dateTimeStr},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) as mysqlTimeStamp, date_format(from_unixtime(#{unixTimeStamp}),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as mysqlDateTime from dual
select inet_aton(#{ip}) as ipNum, inet_ntoa(inet_aton(#{ip})) as ipStr from dual
